basic_information.scholarship_notes: Eligible for full disbursement if graduating in December.
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Stephanie D. Johnson Endowed Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to Juniors or Seniors within the College of Education & Professional Studies who have a learning disability and/or are admitted to the teacher education program and plan to work with students who have a learning disability. Eligibility Requirements Must be admitted to the teacher education program 2.5 GPA or higher Preference will be given to a student with a learning disability at UCO Must be a junior or senior for the academic year in which the scholarship is awarded Must demonstrate financial need Preference given to OK resident Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Recipient is able to receive the full award in the fall, if graduating Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Classification is Sophomore   or SIS_Classification is Junior   or SIS_Classification is Senior
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Classification is Sophomore   or SIS_Classification is Junior   or SIS_Classification is Senior
